Name: Era of Miracles
About the game: Era of Miracles – role-playing game. You are a traveler who went in search of adventure. What can you expect? Can be civil war among orcs?What if you have to find your own gin? Or other exciting adventures? Key feature: • Nonlinear history.Quests that can be completed in different ways. • Dynamic world. On your actions will respond NPC. Dynamic change of day and night. At night shops will not work, and NPC will stray with streets. • The game world in which they live: People, orcs,elves, dwarves and other races. • Exciting gameplay in a variety of locations: get acquainted with the life of other factions, visit the pyramids, forests and other mysterious places. • Complete freedom. You can move in any direction and do what you want
